article_title: India urges workers in Israel to leave border areas
sentence: India  has  urged  citizens  working  in  Israel  to  "relocate  to  safe  areas"  after  an  Indian  national  was  reportedly  killed  near  the  border  with  Lebanon.

article_title: India urges workers in Israel to leave border areas
sentence: However,  it  did  not  directly  address  the  anti-tank  missile  attack,  nor  how  many  people  had  died  or  been  injured.
